name: Cinnamon Sweet Puffs
author: LJL
summary: Easy, VERY sweet, cheap and fun for cooks of all ages!
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans refrigerated biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury Grands!®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray 12 muffin cups with cooking spray
Combine sugar and cinnamon in a bowl
Place a marshmallow in the center of each biscuit and wrap biscuit dough around marshmallow
Press dough to seal marshmallow completely
Roll dough ball in melted butter, then roll in cinnamon-sugar mixture
Arrange each dough ball in the prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 15 minutes
